content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Aug 2019Does anyone know how those cheap rides work on Telegram?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 28 Aug 2019They are posted by Provider (driver) and Requestor (Rider) who needs a ride. There's no middle man thus price is determined by Driver and if a Rider accepts the price quoted, then it's on. Otherwise, there's no deal.1 comment0

Cedric Jamie Soh28 Aug 2019Guys, beside most of those drivers and riders, with no middle men (Grab, GoJek, and Ryde) which are perfectly normal and legal....

There is also some shady criminal enterprise involved in certain rides.
This was reported in Straits Times a few months ago. Go Jek has hackers hacking into the system and pairing the rides for a much lower price.

... (more)

ABAbu BakarLevel 1. FreshieUpdated on 27 Aug 2019Basically it's like Grab but prices are negotiable and more flexible, however, the downside is that it might be harder to get a ride depending on where you are.1 comment0
Question Poster28 Aug 2019But how are they getting lower price on GoJek? When I check, I’m paying a lot lower

Zen Rogue XuanLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 27 Aug 2019By arranging for a ride with drivers, you effectively bypass Grab, which charges a commission between 20-30%. Said commission then goes to discounting your rides.2 comments0
Question Poster27 Aug 2019How is the bypass like?Question Poster28 Aug 2019As in how to bypass I don’t get it
